overview:
Chief Applications Architect and Author, specializing in a wide variety of GIS enabled Insurance Risk Management, and Fraud Prevention Systems deployed on technologies ranging from Mainframe (zOS/zLinux), to distributed systems (Windows/Solaris). Most recent areas of exploration include PaaS solutions (GAE/vFabric), Entity & Relationship Resolution, Big Data Analytics, and Enterprise Software Reuse. Practitioner of Agile Software Development, Continuous Integration & Code Quality (using Atlassian tools w/Sonar), and Critical Chain project management. Education includes a BFA in Graphic Design from the Rochester Institute of Technology in Rochester, NY, and a MSIS Graduate Degree from Stevens Institute of Technology, Hoboken NJ.

I also enjoy competing in Triathlons, playing competitive Foosball, designing & creating web-sites, and building Apple iOS applications.
